channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 2025 Christmas Day NFL games: How to watch today, full streaming schedule and more
item.description:
Christmas Day famously belongs to football. This Dec. 25, there are three NFL games to watch: the Dallas Cowboys vs. Washington Commanders, the Detroit Lions vs. the Minnesota Vikings and the Denver Broncos vs. Kansas City Chiefs. Here's what you need to know about Thursday's football slate, and the rest of the Week 17 schedule. How to watch the NFL Christmas Day games:
Date: Thursday, Dec. 25, 2025 Start times: 1 PM ET, 4:30 PM ET, 8:15 PM ET TV channels: N/A Streaming: Netflix, Prime Video 2025 Christmas Day NFL game slate: Thursday, Dec. 25, 2025
Cowboys vs. Commanders: 1 p.m. (Net...

item.title: Proton VPN réduit de 75 % le prix de son abonnement de 2 ans, idéal pour sécuriser 10 appareils
item.description: Proton VPN est aujourd'hui l'un des réseaux virtuels privés les plus plébiscités. L'abonnement est plutôt onéreux en temps normal, mais actuellement, l'offre de 24 mois peut vous revenir à 2,49 euros par mois au lieu de 9,99 euros par mois.

item.title: How to Set Up a Smartphone for Elderly Loved Ones
item.description: Here's how to make iPhone and Android devices a little easier to use.

item.title: Don’t pay to watch the Boxing Day Ashes Test — here’s how I’m streaming it free
item.description: It's the biggest day in cricket, so don't miss a second of the Boxing Day action from the MCG!

item.title: The Morning Show season 5: everything we know about the Apple TV show's return
item.description: The Morning Show will return for a season five – here's everything we know about the return of Apple TV's most-watched shows.

item.title: Just got a new Samsung Galaxy Watch? Check out these 3 hidden features you won't want to miss
item.description: Samsung's smartwatches are among the best we've tested, and that's in part due to the fantastic feature set. Some are pretty hidden, though; here's the best we've found.

item.title: Song Sung Blue documentary 'could have been its own fictional movie' — but you can finally stream the original for free
item.description: New movie Song Sung Blue is based on the 2008 documentary by Greg Kohs, and after almost 20 years, you can finally stream it.

item.title: On a testé la Mercedes CLA électrique dans une version inédite conçue pour la Chine : voici notre avis
item.description: Face à la montée inexorable des champions chinois de l'électrique premium-luxe, Mercedes-Benz se devait de réagir. C’est chose faite avec une stratégie de localisation inédite pour sa CLA 300L, une version allongée de sa CLA électrique exclusive au marché chinois.

item.title: What’s open on Christmas Day: Holiday hours for fast-food chains, grocery stores, CVS, and more
item.description: As you’ve probably guessed, most government services and institutions are not operating today, but some retail and restaurant chains are. It’s normal—perhaps even biological—to slow down at the end of the year. Winter weather brings less sunlight, causing our bodies to produce more melatonin and less Vitamin D.

item.title: Whats new to streaming this week? (Dec. 25, 2025)
item.description: What’s new on Netflix, Prime Video, and Disney+ for Christmas 2025? We've got you covered.

item.title: Test du Xiaomi Poco F8 Pro : un rapport qualité-prix agressif qui se paye même un téléobjectif
item.description: Le Poco F8 Pro promet le meilleur des mondes : un écran OLED ultra lumineux, un Snapdragon haut de gamme et une batterie gigantesque, le tout à un prix plus doux que celui du F8 Ultra. Une recette réussie ? C’est ce que nous allons voir dans ce test.

item.title: The Gloves Are Off in the Fight for Your Right to Repair
item.description: This year, the right-to-repair movement got a boost from—surprisingly—big tech, tariffs, and economic downturn. But the companies controlling who fixes their stuff aren’t giving up that power willingly.

item.title: 2025’s Best Phones Were Also Its Wackiest
item.description: If anything, iPhones and Pixels are practically vanilla. The next generation is thinner, more transparent, and folds in half. That’s a good thing.

item.title: Giant homebuilder KB Home shifts strategy amid a housing market where it lacks pricing power
item.description: KB Home executives believe that leaning more into built-to-order will help see the company’s margins bottom in Q1 2026. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.
